para.text: This chapter applies only to a foreign-money claim in an action or distribution proceeding.
This chapter applies to foreign money issues even if other law, under the conflict of laws rules of the District of Columbia, applies to other issues in the action or distribution proceeding.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 15-105, in subsecs. (a) and (b), substituted “this chapter” for “this act”.
D.C. Law 15-354, in subsecs. (a) and (b), substituted “this chapter” for “this subchapter”.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 2 of the Uniform Foreign-Money Claims Act.
